question: What is Nirbhay?
explanation: Nirbhay is a long-range subsonic cruise missile developed by the DRDO. The low altitude flying missile can evade detection by radars by flying at tree top level. It can strike targets that are more than 700 km away also and is capable of carrying nuclear warheads. It can also hover over targets, unlike other missiles. It also has a “fire and forget” system.
